EmailTemplate.subject: NCS - Permanent roles available in Reading and London
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact me on judith.burrow@the-challenge.org.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We are contacting you as we believe you may be interested in working for The Challenge full time, in either Reading or London Waterloo.
We are currently recruiting for a Staffing Associate to play a part in recruiting the 3,500 members of summer staff who will shape the NCS programe for 2015. This diverse role involves marketing the programme to a variety of different sources of potential staff, selecting and assessing candidates, and managing relationships to ensure a successful programme delivery.
To view the full job description and to apply for this exciting role, please go to www.the-challenge.org/year-round-roles.
Please do forward this email to anyone who may be interested.
Many thanks for your interest in The Challenge and the NCS programme. Good luck!
Best wishes,
The Staffing Department, London and Reading Email reference: CA 2.4
VISIT NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG NOW
